7.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan (The Call to Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sa'eed bin Jubair that he prayed Maghrib and 'Isha' in Jam' (Muzdalifah) with one Iqamah, then he narrated that Ibn 'Umar had done that, and Ibn 'Umar narrated that the Prophet (S.A.W) had done that

chapter.ara-name: باب الإِقَامَةِ لِمَنْ جَمَعَ بَيْنَ الصَّلاَتَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: The Iqamah For One Who Is Joining Two Prayers
